Text: RE Meeting with Jeff Skilling at Enron Cc you so much I would like to meet them on the week of May th Pam please arrange this Original Message From Ted Hall mailto Sent Tuesday April AM To Masayoshi Son Cc Ken Ohmae Subject Meeting with Jeff Skilling at Enron Masa I enjoyed our evening together on the boat in Yokohama harbor very much As promised I have been in contact with Jeff Skilling at Enron He is interested in meeting with you I have been speaking with Jeffs assistant regarding appropriate dates and mentioned the dates when you will be in New York in May I suggest that your respective offices work together to settle the logistical details Joannie Williamson will handle the arrangements for Jeff email phone I am sure you will have a very interesting conversation If I can help in any other way please let me know Very best regards Ted
